attributes.action: admit that this website is just a way of ignoring the people of this country in a quicker and more convenient way.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that none of the petitions on this website have ever been seen by anyone in government, besides an intern with instructions to write rejection letters. We request that the government admit to this.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
